document.full_text: france has authorized its military to participate in a united nations operation in ivory coast to protect civilians against escalating violence, president nicolas sarkozy's elysee palace office said on monday.
document.title: france says its army joins u.n. action in ivory coast
lines_and_colors: france has authorized its military to participate in a united nations operation in ivory coast to protect civilians against escalating violence, president nicolas sarkozy's elysee palace office said on monday.
